short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this Lemon Squeezy fees calculator to quickly determine fees and your profit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This fee calculator helps you to estimate the fees and know the money you receive for selling your digital products.

✅ THE KEY FEATURES:

✔️ Open in a popup.
✔️ Calculate fees instantly.
✔️ Easy to use in just a few steps.
✔️ Fast loading in Google Chrome.
✔️ Dark design available.
✔️ Not require special permissions.

------------------------------------------------

💻 HOW TO USE:

1️⃣ Enter product price in dollars.
2️⃣ Select customer country.
3️⃣ Select payment fees.

🧐 See results instantly:

💰 Product price
💰 Tax (% VAT)
💰 Total
🍋 Lemon Squeezy fees
🤑 Money you received

------------------------------------------------

🔥 OPEN EXTENSION:

⌨️ Keyboard shortcuts:

Alt + X on Chromeos
Alt + X on Linux
Alt + X on Windows
⌥ + X on MacOS

👇 Other buttons:

🌙 Dark (Enable dark theme)
☀️ Light (Enable light theme)
⭐ Rating (Go to reviews)

------------------------------------------------

❓ FAQs:

🤔 What is Lemon Squeezy?
👉 Is all-in-one platform for selling digital products, subscriptions, software licenses, and courses.

🤔 Who needs this extension?
👉 All users who sell their digital products within lemonsqueezy.

🤔 How do lemonsqueezy payment fees work?
👉 When you make a sale using Lemonsqueezy, they charge you a small fee ($0.50 + 5% of total), known as a “platform fee,” to cover the costs of transaction fees.

🤔 What are processing fees?
👉 There are certain times when an additional fee might be added to the platform fee to cover processing fees:

+1.5% for international (outside of the US) transactions
+1.5% for PayPal transactions
+0.5% for subscription payments

🤔 What is VAT?
👉 Value Added Tax (VAT) is an indirect consumption tax levied on a product or service at each point of its production and distribution cycle, encompassing both tangible goods and digital products.

🤔 How do VAT rates work when selling my product?
👉 If you sell digital products or services on lemonsqueezy, collecting and paying VAT on the sale of digital items in some countries is a necessity. You don’t have to worry about collecting and remitting sales tax (including international tax like VAT) as lemonsqueezy simply takes care of it for you.

🤔 Does this extension work on any page?
👉 Yes. You can open this extension on any page or site.

🤔 What browsers does it work on?
👉 For now it is only available for Google Chrome browser, but soon I will launch in other browsers.

🤔 This extension is free?
👉 Yes. It's FREE and will be forever.
